attributes.action: Let transgender and gay people have their rights!
attributes.additional_details: I want this done because why should everyone else get to live happy and carefree and transgender people and gay people have to live in fear?
attributes.background:
I want all gay and transgender people to feel safe and valid, they shouldn't have to be scared to do every day human things.
Add more gender neutral toliets in public places, teach in schools about different pronouns etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could sign the following petitions which call for similar actions: 

Do not issue guidance making it unsafe for school students to question gender: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639904
Do not introduce new building requirements for separate male and female toilets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642523

Or you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
